content.detailedDescription: I "sensed" the presence of ufos again and went out to take photos. two to three objects showed up, but the bell craft on the bottom was the clearest photo i got.  these objects were just over the rooftops of the houses here.  i don't know how long it stayed in the area, but they keep showing up night after night.  very interesting, exciting.  it is very hard to see these objects sometimes, but when they reflect light they can be seen.  they are easily confused with conventional aircraft from a distance, but taking photos helps to know for sure.  their lights are brighter than conventional aircraft.
content.summary: I was out taking photos again and spotted this craft over our subdivision two blocks away.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car to work, on the northwest freeway heading east towards downtown houston, tx on 11/21/08. at 6:45 am cst i saw something high in the sky moving very fast. at first i thought it might be some sort of a balloon but when it got closer i could see the color was a metal gray and the shape was like a three dimensional plus sign that was not revolving but appeared to be moving back and forth. it disappeared very quickly from my view. i looked around to see if any other drivers saw the same thing but didn't get that impression. i felt exhilarated and called my husband david, who was once very active in mufon, and told him what i saw. he told me not everyone sees ufos and there was a reason for me to see this one today. i've seen ghost and spirits before but this was my first ufo sighting.
content.summary: Saw fast moving "plus sign" above nw freeway in houston 11/21/08.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home, i stepped out the back door to stand on the porch, and smoke.
i looked the the left, to make sure my dogs were not going to wrestle too hard, and then looked forward satisfied that they were being good.
i didn't notice it out of the corner of my eye at all, because the craft was just above swedish medical center, which has a bunch or red lights, because they have (it seems) constant helicopter traffic (flight for life).
anyway i looked and saw this craft going maybe 5 miles an hour, like it was letting it self drift a little, and then within a couple seconds it zoomed off to the south. i was able to see it leave, but it was so fast, that if i would've blinked at the time, i might have only seen a trail of red light, hence the reason the picture of it in my head is kinda blurry.
when i first noticed it, i thought it was the previously mentioned hospital's red lights, but no longer than a second later, there was no  doubt in my mind that it was unidentifiable, and i realized that i could not see a single light from the hospital, from where i was standing.
it was a right triangle, from what i could see (meaning there was a 90 degree angle in it). it was faced south the entire time, and the lights were on the right angle sides that was the leading point.
it happened so fast, that i could not count the lights, and in my memory they kinda blend together, since 2 out of the three seconds i saw it, it was moving faster. it had to have been no more than 300' above swedish.
also, it was really dim, i mean it would not have had light reflecting on any surface, i'd guess, but it was bright enough to make the reddish color glow..Kinda.  it's hard to explain.
i was not scared at all, just amazed. i was filled with excitement shortly after, but i am proud to say that my emotions don't get in the way of doing what needs to be done (thinking on my feet, and making the best decisions, in very little time), so i was in the moment, and had no thought or feeling about it, until it was gone, and then i was amazed.
i lost sight of it as it left going south, and from what i could tell, was aimed at the horizon, so i could not see it after a second or two, because of my neighbor's house blocking my vision.
i stayed there, and didn't even move my head (for about a minute), so i could gauge where it was, and what direction it took off, and after i collected my thoughts, and went over what had just happened, i walked fast to the east, to see if i could see it around the house, , but i knew it was going to be gone already(judging by the speed it left), and it was nowhere to be seen. if i had been up higher, i might have been able to see it, but the hospital blocks my vision of the south horizon.
the picture i drew is not to my liking, but i am tired of working on it, and it's close enough. i just want to say that the lights were more separated than in the picture. i estimate the craft to be about 100-200' wide. and, it was lower than i drew, i could see all of it, but it was closer to the house, than i drew, and was bigger in comparison to the house, than i drew.
i included a picture of where i was standing, at the best angle i could get to show you where i was.
i wanted to be very thorough, so if you (internet readers) made it to the end of this report, then thank you for your time!
any further questions are welcome, from any sincere person(s).
thanks,
destiny
content.summary: It was a very dim, right triangle, with about 7 to 9 reddish  lights on the front two sides.

content.detailedDescription: Whilst  driving  a  pizza  delivery   van  {last  delivery  of  night} down  a  serpentine  road  into  a  popular  estate, noticed  approx  quarter  mile  away  a  very  large  silver  star {four  points ] just silently  commanding  the  night  sky, which  by  the  way  in  dec  was  absolutely  void  of  cloud  or  haze, crisp  clear  night. i  looked  at  my  watch  time  was  as  indicated 2345, there  was  no  other  traffic  so  slowed  van  down  to  a  standstill. after  switching  off  the  engine  and  winding  down  the  drivers  side  window  i  commenced to  get  a  better  look  at  this  strange  silent  star. after  perhaps  two  mins  the  star  vanished, not  unlike  the  quickness  of  a  illuminated  light  bulb  suddenly  switched  off , still  there  was  no  traffic  and  no  percievable  noise  or  inquisitive  sightings  from  any  one  else. for  perhaps  a  minute  i  strained  my  eyes  in  the  night  sky  to  identyfy  anything  which may  have  been  a  repercussion  of  this  star. suddenly  i  was  rewarded,and  dare  i  say  it, not  in  anyway  frightening  i  observed  the  following  now  some  eighty  feet  above  me.. i  observed  an  oval  shaped  craft  some  thirty  feet  long  with  a  misshapen  type  of  dome  some  eight  feet  high  upon  its  upper  surface. the  colouring  was  very  distinct, kind  of  a  rusty  red  colour, like  metal  after  it  had  undergone extreme  tempertures. the  base  of  the  oval  craft  was  also  very  definable  showing  a  number  of  exhaust-ports  rather  than  lights, which  began  to  intensify  as  the  craft  negotiated  what  i  percieve  was  a  portal,a  gateway  to   inner-space. please  take  note.. this  craft  was  moving  uncannily  slow  four-five  mls  per  hour  in  earthly  terms. directly  in  front  of  the  oval  craft  immediately  as  the  orange  ports  rotated  a  "doorway"  was  created  by  some  release  of  unknown  energy. twas  not  unlike  watching  this  craft   dissapearing  behind  a  shaking  mirror  in  space, for  please  remember  the  night  sky  was  crisp  and  clear. again  because  i  have  also  been  privy  to  other  close  encounters  i  would  say  i  was  not  afraid  either  before  seeing  the  star  and  craft  nor  after. there  is  little  phenomena  of  this  kind  that  actually  could  frighten  me. after  returning  back  home  i  drew  strange  pictures  of  alien  orighns, perhaps  even  dimensional entitys.It  is  my  perception  as  a  psyche  that  the  star  first  sighted  was  not  a  star  but  a  portal  opening  within  two  space  times. i  always  have  and  always  will  be  available  for  stringent  tests, scrutiny  to  prove  the  validity  of  this  sighting  and  a  few  others,
content.summary: Observed  at  first  a  huge  silver  star, which  after  a  minute  vanished. then  was  fortunate  to  observe  oval  craft  some  eighty  feet  above  me, i  felt  they  were  also  aware  of  my  prescence.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up,and took my dog for a walk at 5:15.About three to five mins into walk i turned north west and seen a very bright light to the nw.I stood there not believing what i was seeing for about 20-30 seconds,i then ran into the house to try and find a camera,my camera/video recorder broke last month.After 15-20 seconds not finding one i ran back out the front door.As i walked out the light was right over my house,and no plane could ever cover that many miles that quick.I stood there looking at it another 20 seconds when the light went out,and i ran in the house.No plane or space station has lights that bright,it was orange like light that was so bright.Other people should have seen it,still dont know if im alone in seeing it.This is the first time i have ever seen anything i cant explain.
content.summary: Bright light moving over englewood florida

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling west in the 1300 block of west washington when i saw a series of flashing lights in the sky to the southwest. the lights went in sequence 1,2,3 this happened two times and then dissapeared. other people that i work with saw the same thing. the lights appeared to be yellow in color. i have never seen anything like it before, and i dont know what it could have been.
content.summary: Series of flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
During this same week, not certain which day, i left fort washington, pa driving to norristown, pa. via rt.73 at about 6 pm.  while driving west, i noticed the lights in the w-nw sky.  

they appeared to be coming from above the relatively low cloud cover. the lights, four of them, were repeating in a somewhat circular/elongated  pattern, converging at a 'central point', then departing that point emanating outward at approximately 90��� angles from the central point. when at their 'outermost' location from center, the 'beams' had an elongated pattern on the clouds above.

i turned off route 73 and began winding via side-streets and roads toward the lights.

as i began to approach the location of the convergent overhead lights, i was able to see that the lights had a terrestrial origin. i was able to see the 'light beam' emanating from ground level.

i continued to follow the apparent source and soon found that they were coming from normandy farms, a local hotel/restaurant in blue bell, pa.

there was much traffic into and out of the facility and i assume that something 'special' was occurring.

i am not certain what the event was.
content.summary: Response to 16th & 19th november, pa sightings

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car at the time, travelling to belgium. it was early and quiet in the morning. i was looking out of the window, when i realised there were three strange disk-like shapes in the sky. those objects weren't moving and were pretty big for a bird or a plane, so my thought was it had to be ufos. i was really excited by this phenomenon. i decided to take a photo to observe it more closely. looking back i saw there were also lights on them. two ufos were close together and one in a distance. the one in a distance was more detailed. as i kept driving on, i lost the view of the objects.
content.summary: There appeared to be three at the time. they were disc-like shaped and had lights on them.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling in a se direction by car from gilmer tx to longview tx at about 5:30 pm on 11/20/2008 when about 2 miles outside of gilmer i noticed out of the driver's side portion of the windshield a bright green light.  the light was falling in a straight line at a 45 degree angle or so and was visible for about 5 seconds.  the circumference and the shade of green was about that of a traffic light from a distance of a quarter mile or less.  it didn't blink or flicker but was solid green from the moment it came into view through my windshield to the moment it disappeared into or behind a thick field of pine trees. i'm not sure of the distance from me but it seemed fairly close because of the way it went down behind the trees.  i didn't see any smoke or hear any sounds. i was on the phone with my wife at the time and watched it long enough to say "what is that.  there is a green light falling from the sky" it may have been nothing but a meteor but i wanted to report it in the event that someone else saw it as well.
content.summary: Solid green light fell from sky and disappeared behind field of pine trees

content.detailedDescription: This is an update to the report that i filed on the 19th or 20th of november 2008. in that report i had stated that i estimated the date of the sighting to be around september 11, 2008 (because i had deleted the report i had typed into my computer). i was just able to confirm that the date was actually september 4, 2008 at 9:15 pm, not september 11, 2008. thought you might like to have the exact date.
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft with flsshing red and white lights.

content.detailedDescription: I spotted 3 bright lights in the sky after exiting the christiana mall near wilmington.  at first i thought they were stars or airline traffic headed toward philadelphia.  i watched the objects for a few minutes.  they did not move.  they were hovering at different altitudes.  the highest object was the farthest south, while the lowest object was farthest north.  i left the mall and continued toward hockessin, de.  while headed north on rt. 7, i noticed the 3 objects again.  this time, the lowest object was moving toward the east, at a lower altitude.  it appeared to be completely round (ball-like) but was surrounded by a light which pulsated as it moved.  the light was unlike typical plane strobes or flashing lights.  the object seemed to glow and pulsate.  i lost sight of it as i traveled north on rt. 7.
content.summary: 3 stationary lights at different altitudes.  1 moved and pulsated with light.

content.detailedDescription:
I went with friends to a place in the desert who are spring waters and i took them to see a place i know with petrogliphs. when we were preparing to have lunch, someone saw this cirlces. soem of us, got into it, and felt very bad. nausea, headache, and extreme fatigue. 
that is a hot place of ufo sightings. i have seen strange ligths many times out there.
there was not car prints, or foot prints around them, there was no crossing between the circles.
content.summary: Crop circles

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed with the shades open around 11 pm and a blinking light catches my eye. look out the window more and this strange looking object blinking blue, red and a white color is outside. its off to the east towards watervile and the longer you watch the stranger it seems. makes sudden smooth moves, some times in half circles. i latter notice legitimate  looking planes and lots of them, some moving close to the object. i heard around 5 jets over this time period, odd for night time in rural maine. when i went out side, it seemed the teardropish object had something sticking out to my right, it seemed to move closer at times.  it never scared me, but i got a sense it was watching something and the other planes where sent into, to look into the matter. lost sight when i feel asleep around 1 am, woke up at around 3 it was gone. it moved from time to time, but stayed in the same area roughly.
content.summary: Object towards the east darts around in the same area for about 2 hours, does not look or act like a plane

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my sister in wva. i took my dog outside before going to bed. over from her house, above the tree line in the sky, there was a bright light. i asked my sister what it was and she said she didn't know. we started watching it get bigger and brighter. i ran inside to get my video camera. i have it all on video. to see it with the naked eye, it doesnt seem to move but on the video it dances around, goes out then comes back on brighter. it is like a sphere with multi colors. on the video you can see something at the bottom of the light that looks to me like the top of a spaceship.It happened around 11:00 p.M. but was later the next couple of nights. we watched and videoed it for three nights straight. it stayed there for about 1 to 2 hrs. each night. there are three other witnesses besides me. my sister says it was never there before that time and hasn't come back as far as she knows. but here husband gets up early for work and they go to bed early. maybe she has just missed it. spencer, wva. is in the middle of nowhere. there are no industries or military bases there where we saw it, in fact there was nothing except trees. i would love to know what it is. i have tried and tried to get someone to listen but they wont.This was filmed about a year ago and i have been trying to get someone to explain it all this time.I know we saw something strange and unusual those nights. everytime i watch the video it gives me an uneasy feeling,
content.summary: I have it filmed on dvd

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out to smoke and i herd dogs barking when i looked to see what was going on i froze in shock of the of the object i thought it was a zepplin at first untell i relised that  thing it was just hovering above stanley elm. and its stayed there untell about 7:08 and in like a flash it was gone 

i was scared and exsited at the same time i thought it was a late travler from the october ufo federation of light thing 

i am still in shock 

this is my first sighting
content.summary: Big and fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out to smoke and i herd dogs barking when i looked to see what was going on i froze in shock of the of the object i thought it was a zepplin at first untell i relised that  thing it was just hovering above stanley elm. and its stayed there untell about 7:08 and in like a flash it was gone 

i was scared and exsited at the same time i thought it was a late travler from the october ufo federation of light thing 

i am still in shock 

this is my first sighting
content.summary: Big and fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was making a delivery around 3:30a. i witnessed a triangular wedged shape craft hovering about a residential treeline. the tailend had an orange glow like a light stick you'd find in a sporting goods store. after watching it for around 20 minutes it started to pick up speed and ultimately flew out of site. i saw it again two mornings later around the same time. this is the first time i have reported what i saw.
content.summary: Saw object hovering over lake harding at around 5 mph then it accelerated away at a very high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the back porch talkin on the telephone to a friend, when i noticed in the eastern sky a line of lights in the distance that was about one inch long parallel to the ground, seconds later a second set of lights appeared above and to the left of the first lights at a 45 degree angle, these lights appeared to be goin away from me........Then a third set of lights appeared off to the right of the first set of lights and they were postioned at a 45 degree down angle, the lines of lights were going from right to left and back again on all three sets at the same time. i told my friend on the phone and called my wife out but they were gone before she could see them.........I noticed off to the right a us 
aircraft proceeding towards them from the south.....The lights disappeared. the second set disappeared first, then the third set and the first set was last disappearing and then they didn't re-appear. the us aircraft continued on a northly path to the area where the lights were and just kept on goin north........The lights were like an orangish, reddish, gold color just flashing from right to left and back again, similar to ones i previously seen on oct. 23, 2008 and oct. 29, 2008, but this time there were three sets instead of just one set........And the same colors.........
content.summary: Lights over abilene.

content.detailedDescription: I was 12yrs and after a football game that we just won against westside colt's we were niles little red dragon's. after shaking hand's both team's seperated and huddled on the side line's of wilder feild wadell park niles, oh. at that point the crowd got suddenly quiet and started pointing and looking directly up above the center of the football feild. about one hundred feet above the light's was a ufo disk shaped object motionless and no noise coming from object. at that point parent' started to pull there family's off the feild toward's the car's in a hurry also many of them scared. as i and other's were looking up across the street at the same height was a second ufo object of the same shape and size. they had white light's probally 3'x4' rectangular shaped circling around the edge of the two object's. i was the last person on the feild as i had to retrieve some football gear for my coach mr. al cirrello and mr. reggie giancola, also a few of my fellow player's. i ran directly under the object while keeping an eye on the ufo the whole time. my coach told me to "hurry up and get up over here and go turn the main light switch for the feild off" which was alway's standard proceedure. the object's were still sitting in the same spot's in the air. we then waited for everyone to leave the feild, then we got into the van and proceeded to pull out of the parking lot and onto exit road. we turned left and pulled over to the side of the "bowl" which was known as the practice feild. out of all that time the two object's had not yet began to move or make any kind of noise for about 20 minute's. are coaches said "let's stay here and see what happen's" they also said "that you boy's may never see anything like this again". "we are older and have never seen except heard of something like this". then the one ufo came acrossed the road and postioned itself right next to other one still never making any kind of sound. within a couple of second's they took off toward's the city of niles. only leaving a light trail then in too different direction's they made unbelievable different turn's and dissapeared. there was an art class from our high school, niles mckinley the teacher mr. bertolenni of which his student's were at stevens park that evening drawing picture's of the fall evening just by chance some of the student's noticed the ufo above the park and proceeded to sketch picture's of the ufo's that they had seen of what they sketched as fast as they could because the object's did not stay very long. there was alot of attention drawn to the sighting's for a couple of day's then it was part of history. since then i have been in the united state's marine corp during 1972 - 1974 of which at that time my m.O.S. was to go to school to learn how to refuel aircraft. during that time i had went to school and graduated top of my class in tank farm and aircraft fuel station's in the feild. i refueled many type's of aircraft and helicopters also vertical and horizontal flying jet's. i have never seen or experienced anything that move's or fly's without any noise while being so close from what i seen on that evening. i am now and alway's will be semper fidelias to my belief in ufo's noone or nothing can ever change that.
content.summary: Many siting's in "niles  boardman , struthers" trumbull county ohio.

content.detailedDescription: Call me somthing wronge with your site
content.summary: Large disk.

content.detailedDescription: I left my house at approx. 7:30 p.M. last night to go shopping.  i noticed two unusual cloud-like streaks in the sky, almost looked like they were lights coming down.  i was looking up only because i saw unusual lights in that same direction on saturday, nov. 16th.  i returned from shopping close to 9 p.M., and i could still see these streaks, so they were definately not trails from a plane.  my husband thinks some one is having a grand opening in the area and using beacon lights in the sky.  i am approx 9 miles north/northwest of philadelphia, near the fort washington turnpike interchange, these lights/streaks appear south and west of my location.  i did not look for the lights after 9 p.M.
content.summary: Vertical white streaks in sky

content.detailedDescription:
This is a confirmation of report 13842 where the man from eastland, tx, saw the same thing although he was much closer.  i had the close to the same experience last month, although the lights were further sw.  just after 1800 i sat above possum kingdom lake off of hwy 16 in a new development called "the hills above possum kingdom", excellent elevated view to the s and sw, and it was where i witnessed the event last month.

i had nothing to do so i stopped there on my way home from work in graham, tx.  sat there for a bit; saw either a huge satellite or space station move quietly from sw to ne, extremely bright, so that had me fired up.  and i was not to be disappointed.  the orange lights appeared like flashes - you blink, you miss.  then some would stay a little longer, all in same area in sky.  they would line up, then one on right would blink off and appear to the left of the other.  for a millisecond there were two lined up vertically (the others were all horizontally lined), barely caught them.  this lasted from 6-7pm and then i left.  the other report referencing this same event, 13842, has his sightings an hour later so apparently they didn't quit when i stopped watching.  also, these "lights" didn't (to me) appear to be their own source of light at times; almost as if they were being lit up by another source(?).  very strange and wondrous at same time.  i would advise anyone reading this to station yourself west of fort worth, in a good elevated, dark area (west of palo pinto on hwy 180 is good spot) and sit after the sun goes down and scan from south to west and take a good camera (like i don't have) on a tripod and have it ready or just keep it recording.  you will probably not be disappointed - this seems to be an ongoing happening.
content.summary: Fast blinking orange lights in different formations.

content.detailedDescription: I was sittin in the walgreens parking lot that is at the intersection of oxford valley and woodbourne roads waiting for my husband to come out of the store.Out of the corner of my eye i saw an flame colored object come from behind the trees(it was a good 1/2 mile away) and it went straight up in the sky and then slowly hovered to the left. the color of it was what caught my eye and the way it moved. almost like a hoovering bug-quickly and fluently. it was shaped like a diamond but was all covered in yellow and orange like a flam. there definitely was not any white or red lights like a helicopter and it was too high to be a helicopter.It hovered in the same spot for a good minute and i thought i must be crazy so i just ignored it. my husband got back in the car and started to talk to me and cut himself off and said what the heck is that. the light of it caught his eye too. i finally felt not so stupid. i explanied where it had come from etc..  he wanted to get closer to see if it could be coming from something explainable!! as we continued out of the parking lot in the direction it was, it started going up slowly. it was going straight up - no angle. then it was gone. it totally just disappeared straight up but in a blink. we hadn't taken our eyes off of it. we still can not get over it. my daughter who is 8 also was in the car and she was also in shock.We were so mad as we did not have a camera with us.
content.summary: Looked like a yellowish orange orb in sky hovering around.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out my back door to feed my cats and as usual i look up to check out the night sky. jupiter and venus are bright and beautiful in the clear western sky when i see another bright star(object) near them. i didn't think much of it because houston's international airport is only some ninety-eight miles away and a lot of the time the planes have the landing lights still on and are very bright when they fly over. as this object drew closer(moving west to east)  i waited to see navigation lights (red & green)but saw nothing, i went to get my binoculars all this has only taken about a minute and a half. i look through my binos and at the object nearly over head. there are no navigational lights at all and it's not one bright light but three small, bright lights in a triangular formation one in front and two closely behind. i call my son to take a look, "dad it's a star or plane(unaided eye)" first response i do not tell him what i saw through my binos. "here take a look," i tell him, "tell me what you see the object is over head now." he says,"dad it's three smaller lights, not one, it's in an arrow or trianglur shape, that's what i see." i then get excited and tell him "that's exactly what i saw!" there was also no navigational lights and  no sound and maybe eleven to twelve hundred feet high. we watch the object til it's out of sight and still have no idea what it could have been.
content.summary: Bright triangular object...

content.detailedDescription:
As i was closing the drapes, i happen to look out to the sky.It was a clear cold night.  i noticed to the south west, one very bright star or head light. it was brighter than the closest star.   i retrieved my binoculars to get a better look.  it was one very bright head light. as i watched it, at one point, with my binoculars,it turned a colorful shade of different colors. colors like red,blue purple and violet. sometimes it would fade out and come back strong again. than it did a very astonishing thing, it bounced up and down. it reminded me of a pickup truck on a holy road. stars and planest do not bounce like that. then it would stay still again. as all this went on, it moved ever so slowly to the north west and then it would stop, and move again.  i even seen a plane that passed south of it, and planes blinking beacons were not as bright as the ufo.
    before i left i even had my brother and neice to our window to view it. and he seen it bounce up and down as well.  
    i had to leave and go pick my husband up. we drove down a treeless road, and i spotted it again. but only shortly, for 13 minutes after the hour it just dissappered.
   i never ever thought i would see such a sight, and as others, you believe that there are others out in this vast universe, besides ourselves.  hopefully we will be able to meet with these personages someday. we may be able to help each other.
content.summary: A very bright star or one big head light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was contacted by my nephew around 8:30pm, he asked me to go outside and see if i could see what he was seeing.  i went outside and over the phone we kind of established where i should be looking.  it took a few minutes as i live in a somewhat wooded area, but i did see one spotlight light through the trees.

with my newphew still on the phone, i got into my car and started to go down my driveway, which is long, on the way down the drive, i got a great view of the lights..It seemed as if there was one large light and several, if not what i told my newphew was it looked light hundreds of smaller, less intense lights, he agreed.  i continued to drive, but at around 9pm i lost sight of it and went back home.

i was the third or fourth person my newphew contacted, my newphew lives about 10 miles away from me, i live in montgomery county, but the lights we in the direction of bucks county.

i was glad to see that others have reported the same.
content.summary: Lights, seeming to come from the sky, like a spot light pointing down

content.detailedDescription:
View from amtrak train - trying to capture the tangerine and purple hues of the sunrise in early pre=dawn.

i've one other viewing in another town in the west coast-daylite and white half circle - seemingly missed when taking the picture...Towards the expanse of the landscape in the distance, same left corner....Gotta dig it up.

calmness for me in all possible viewings all my life
content.summary: Seemingly water vapor, half circle reflective to rising sun.

content.detailedDescription: my name is brian anctil, i'm 22 years old. the first sighting was outside my work, it was augest 2008 around 9:00pm, i cannot remeber the day exactly, but i walked outside looked up and took notice of one of the brighter stars with a yellowish color to it, it was twinkling, so i watched it for a few seconds until it gave a sort of pulse, and went out, i watched the area for a little while longer and it never came back. i thought that was weird and told my girlfriend about it and some other friends, and we just thought it was odd. then oct.10,2008 around 8:00pm,i went out for my break with my girlfriend kris, who works with me, anyway, i sat down looked up and saw the same bright light with the same yellow look to it, it was on the other side of the building this time, so i pointed excitedly out to my girlfriend to look at it and she did, as we watched it, it moved straight up in a line and pulsed a bit and went out. at this point i think something odd is up, but now 2 of us have seen it and that was freaky enough. so at this point, i'm telling friends and family about it, thinking how odd it was that i had seen this thing twice now. anyway, so on oct 13, 2008 around 11:00pm, my friend branden picked me up to go for a drive to the beach to talk and hang out. so we get too the beach and we had a good view of the stars and it reminded me to tell him all about the last 2 sightings. i starting explaining but the call of nature was herd and i had to step out for a to go pee, so i stepped out and headed for some logs on the beach and did my thing, as i was looking up at the sky wondering if i was going to see anything, but alas, nothing, so i got back in the car and started finishing telling him what i had seen, when he jokingly pointed out the window and said "like that?" and it was the same bright yellow looking star, and i just say star because it was bright as hell and made no noise any time i saw it... so i said yes, it looked exactly like that, then i told him i would start to be freaked out if it just faded out, and thats what it did.    each sighing lasted about a min or 2,  same bright star looking object, moved up on one sighting before fading out. but all faded out in the same sort of way. feel free to contact me, i talk better than i type. sorry i have no footage, just other people who saw it. just figured someone should know something is going on over here.
content.summary: 3 sightings, same thing, multiple people saw it with me.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving into eastland from ranch rd 570.  i was just outside eastland, approaching i-20 when i rounded a bend and noticed a large flash of orange light to the se over the leon river area south of i-20.  i caught the flash out of the corner of my eye, and it was gone in a second.  i began to wonder if i had really seen anything.  i passed under i-20 and continued into eastland on east main st.  about a half-mile into town after passing i-20, i noticed a small but bright row of three lights appear out of nowhere in the same area of sky--se off towards i-20 and the leon river.  the lights were close together and were white with an orange tinge.  at first i thought it was just a plane with its landing lights on (eastland has a small airport, and you see stuff like this all the time.  what caught my attention was the orange tint.  i had actually seen these same lights earlier this year january 15th on the same stretch of road.  on the jan. 15th sighting, the lights hovered atop a large cloud over eastland as i was driving into town on the same road.  suddenly the lights disappeared.  a minute or two later i saw them again in my side mirror.  they were behind me at the opposite end of the sky in the south.  the object did not travel from point a to point b.  it just disappeared and reappeared.  i did not report this sighting before.  i thought the hovering and disappearing and reappearing was strange, but i convinced myself that it must've been two separate planes with their landing lights on.  however, i change my tune now because i saw the same lights again tonight (nov. 19) and what they did next made me realize that they were anything but plane lights.)  back to the nov. 19th sighting:  after i saw the set of three orange tinted lights appear, they immediately appeared to merge into one large globe of orange light!  the globe was about the diameter of the original three lights.  at this point, the light was all orange, no white light.  immediately after the lights merged into one, it appeared that two more globes of orange light of the same size emerged from the one forming a string of three lights in a horizontal line.  a short pause passed and then a fourth orange globe appeared in the line.  this set of lights were of a different size, color, and were more widely spaced apart than the original orange/white object it had morphed from.  almost as soon as the string of lights appeared they blinked out all at once.  immediately, one of the orange globes of light flashed on and off in a different location at a higher altitude and to the left of the original object.  immediately after that, another one of the orange globes of light flashed on and off above and just to the right of the last one.  and that was it.  it all happened really fast within a matter of seconds.  i was driving as it was happening and didn't have time to grab my phone to take a picture or anything.  i almost had a wreck looking at it.  i was completely awed and fascinated.  i have never seen lights as big as those in the sky and the whole display took up a huge area in the sky, and it was really their behavior that surprised me.  these were not street lights or plane lights.  i actually saw the white strobes of two planes flying in the same section of sky as the ufo, traveling in opposite directions and these globes of light dwarfed those or any other plane lights i have ever seen.  the lights appeared and disappeared as quickly as you please.  they did not appear to be lights attached to one large craft; i could see no indication of the body of a craft.  they looked like "disembodied" lights doing really strange things.  after the sighting, i decided to travel in the direction of the object and got onto hwy 6 traveling toward carbon and gorman.  just outside of carbon i saw a cluster of white strobes blinking alternately in a repeating pattern.  the group of lights moved steadily and in formation to the east.  they moved pretty quickly and lost sight of them after a while.  i had never seen a cluster of strobes in such tight formation; however, i must concede that this part of the sighting could have a group of planes flying in formation.  the lights looked like your run-of-the-mill plane lights.  it's just unusual to see planes flying in tight formation in this area, and i've lived in eastland co. all my life.  but i do have to concede that this last group of lights could be explained as normal aircraft in formation.  however, the orange lights i saw were completely unexplainable to me.
content.summary: Orange string of lights hovering, disappearing, and reappearing in different locations

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the walmart parking lot in picayune, ms at approximately 7:30 am cst.  i saw a bright silver/white cigar shaped object in the sky with a black band around it's middle.  the black band covered about 1/5 of the total objects length. it was traveling at a constant speed west to east.  object traveled in a straight line.  object was orientated in-line with direction of travel.  the sky was completely clear and very blue. 

i first thought it was a plane.  as it got closer i noticed it had no wings or tail section. next, i thought it might be a bird (black body and white wings) soaring in the morning sky.  as it passed overhead and slightly north i realized the "bird" had no head or tail. and, it appeared to be a smooth surfaced cylindrical object with rounded ends. i heard no sounds from the object as it passed over.

i have no idea how high it was, but object length was about one finger width at arm length when overhead. speed is also unknown. however, there were few nearby trees etc. and it took a good two-three minutes for the object to pass over. compared to my observation of a space station fly over here in houston on nov 20, 2008, it appeared to be traveling across the sky at about the same speed.

i looked around the parking lot, but saw no one outside.  it was very cold that morning - about 32f. as far as i know i'm the only one to observe the object. unfortunately, i had no binoculars or camera with me.

is it possible it was the space station and the cold morning air acted like a magnifier? seems unlikely, but i've seen "inversion" mirages over water that make houses, etc. 20 miles away and over the horizon appear to be only 2-3 miles away.

any help identifying the object would be really appreciated.
content.summary: Bright silver/white cigar shape ufo with black band in middle.
